snippet: Michael R. Bloomberg’s push in the final month of the midterm campaigns could play a pivotal role in two of the country’s most closely contested races for governor, in Michigan and in Massachusetts.
abstract: Michael R Bloomberg plans to leave $25 million footprint in month before midterm elections as part of final push to elect centrist-oriented candidates of both parties; Bloomberg will pay for television ads through his Independence USA PAC.
lead_paragraph: Michael R. Bloomberg’s push in the final month of the midterm campaigns could play a pivotal role in two of the country’s most closely contested races for governor, in Michigan and in Massachusetts.

headline.main: Bloomberg Tries to Help Centrists With TV Ads
